oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mr. and Mrs. Castile
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of married couple, Confederate veteran, joined Brown's 55th Cavalry from Benton County. His regiment was absorbed by Co. A, 24th Infantry. He was wounded in the Battle of Shiloh, although not severely. May have been captured and then escaped, according to family lore.
